summary: Completed comprehensive testing of new home services feature for BeautyBar609. Testing covered backend APIs, frontend UI components, pricing toggles, and booking form functionality.

minor_issues.issue: Returns empty array because salon prices lack 'service_type' field in database
minor_issues.impact: Frontend shows empty salon prices when filtering by service type
minor_issues.details: Salon prices were created without service_type field, so query filtering fails. Home prices have service_type='home' and work correctly.

passed_tests: Price display shows higher home service prices
All home booking form fields present and functional
Successful form submission with success message
action_item_for_main_agent: MINOR: Fix salon prices query by either (1) updating existing salon price records to include service_type='salon' field, or (2) modifying the /api/prices endpoint to treat missing service_type as 'salon' by default. Currently GET /api/prices?service_type=salon returns empty array.
